title: Ask DT! You Might Even Get An Answer. (If Your Question Isn't Asinine)

media:group.media:title: Ask DT! You Might Even Get An Answer. (If Your Question Isn't Asinine)
media:group.media:description:
Today's live stream will be a Q&A session between me and those of you hanging out in the YouTube chat.    Ask questions about Linux and tech, of course.  Off-topic questions might be accepted as well as long as they are not too asinine.
